title: Bronze Ranked ( Non Toxic )
body:
IGN - Phraser
I'm a JG Main. 
I can go tank or dmg, your choice. I usually choose to help team comp and synergy, and hope you guys can do the same :)
( DMG ) Preferred - Lee Sin, Rengar, Wukong/Kha
( HP ) - Rammus, Zac, Shen
My secondary is mid. ( Only AP mids )
I'm looking for someone to fill the rest of the roles and, climb out of bronze.
I can already see the silver border. 
Add Me if interested.

replies.body:
Susson3
Hit me up bro.
JG : Rammus, Volibear or Xin Zhao
Top : Kayle, Swain, Volibear, Tahm Kench
Supp : Sona, Soraka, Tahm Kench
Mid : Malzahar, Swain
added keen for next season :) i mainly go top/adc {{champion:104}} is my right hand man

I know the seasons ending btw, so just in case you guys are confused.
This is for next season ;)
